WorkItem.ClosedComment:
This is very similar to this issue, https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/1542

and this discussion

https://typescript.codeplex.com/discussions/445557
WorkItem.Description: It would be very useful if the compiler had an option for minification on build.

Comments.Message:
Actually this is a duplicate of https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/157.

The issue #1542 is more about code optimisation, which is not the same as minification.
